references: D. W. Boyd, Some integer sequences related to the Pisot sequences, Acta Arithmetica, 34 (1979), 295-305.
links: D. W. Boyd, Linear recurrence relations for some generalized Pisot sequences, Advances in Number Theory ( Kingston ON, 1991) 333-340, Oxford Sci. Publ., Oxford Univ. Press, New York, 1993.
formula: It is not true that a(n) = a(n-1) + a(n-6) - e.g. a(38) = 110155 = 85711 + 24445 - 1 = a(37) + a(32) - 1. Sequence is believed to be non-recurring.
crossrefs: See A008776 for definitions of Pisot sequences.
author: _Simon Plouffe_
